meanings.definition: Superlative form of jerky, meaning the most dry and tough
meanings.sent1: The beef jerky I had yesterday was the jerkiest I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The jerkiest part of the hike was climbing the steep, rocky hill.
meanings.sent3: I tried to chew the jerkiest piece of jerky, but it felt like eating shoe leather.
meanings.sent4: Her jerkiest response to the question was a dry 'I don't know.'
meanings.sent5: The jerkiest jerky in the store was so tough, it could break your teeth.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of jerk, meaning the most abrupt and rude
meanings.sent1: He gave me the jerkiest reply when I asked for help.
meanings.sent2: The jerkiest driver on the road cut me off without signaling.
meanings.sent3: Despite his jerkiest behavior, we still managed to have a good conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her jerkiest attitude made everyone uncomfortable in the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The jerkiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager immediately.
